name: WirelessSwitch
0:
”Alexa, turn on all bedroom lights”
”Alexa, turn off ventilation fan”
”Alexa, turn off all switches”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Want to control your lights or power outlet with voice? Link your Wireless Switch Center with Alexa you can turn on/off your wireless switch with voice, or turn multiple switches at once with Alexa group.

In Order to start:
1. Download Our App from Google play store/Apple app store
2.You need to create a Wireless Switch Account and setup the devices
3.Link Alexa Smart Skill with your account


After setup account and link with Alexa, just say:
"Alexa, discover devices"
"Alexa, turn on my bedroom light"
"Alexa, turn on all bedroom lights"
"Alexa, turn off ventilation fan"
"Alexa, turn off all switches"

For Instruction on how to create the device see link below: https://www.instructables.com/id/Wireless-Switch-Remote-Power-Switch/
